headline: ‘Baby steps’ toward retirement: Prudential gives Generation Beta a savings kick start and launches first-of-kind study
summary: NEWARK, N.J., January 01, 2025--Today Prudential Financial, Inc. (NYSE: PRU) joins the world in welcoming Generation Beta (people born Jan. 1, 2025, to Dec. 31, 2039) by commissioning a first-of-its-kind report, Generation Beta: Redefining Life, Longevity, and Retirement, that reveals how Americans envision the future, and how technological, social and economic shifts will impact their financial security.

headline: How Five Pros Are Inflation-Proofing Their Investments
summary: Stock indexes are setting new records, bitcoin hit $100,000 and the Federal Reserve just cut rates for the third time in less than six months.  There was persistently hot economic data even before  Donald Trump  won the election on a platform of trade tariffs and immigration crackdowns, both historically inflationary policies.  Bond yields also rose sharply in the last quarter of the year, stoking fears that rates and inflation would jump in tandem, sparking a repeat of the 2022 market selloff.
